projectGridLines.title: Cloud/Backend
projectGridLines.description:
About this opportunity

We are seeking a motivated individual to join our team as an junior level Backend and Cloud SW engineer to join our

development team in India and take part in creating new cutting-edge technologies, cloud-based services for iTero systems.

In this role, you will...

• Be part of a team of SW engineers working on a large scale, distributed, cloud-based services.

• Work closely and willingly with your team members, and with members in other teams.

• Ability to combine between technological and personal skills.

In this role, you’ll need ...

• Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field, or equivalent educational

experience.

• Strong programming knowledge in C# or any other OOP language

• Good understanding of Data structures and Algorithms.

• Knowledge of databases and cloud platforms is desired.

• Strong problem-solving skills, detail-oriented and ability to work in an agile environment are essential

• Has passion to learn new technologies and new business.

• Effective communication skills, adaptability and positive attitude

• A foundational understanding of Azure DevOps, security, compliance, and networking principles.

• Knowledge of CI/CD methodologies.

• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

• Excellent communication and teamwork capabilities.

• A proactive learning mindset and adaptability in a dynamic environment.
